paper.title: The reduction of two-way automata to one-way automata
paper.venue: Ibm Journal of Research and Development
paper.abstract: Rabin has proved 1,2 that two-way finite automata, which are allowed to move in both directions along their input tape, are equivalent to one-way automata as far as the classification of input tapes is concerned. Rabinu0027s proof is rather complicated and consists in giving a method for the successive elimination of loops in the motion of the machine. The purposeo f this note is to give a short, direct proof of the result.
